page.title: 20 Wolverhampton Languages
page.content: My name is Satvir Kaur Dhalwal. I live in Wednesfield. I am a Sikh and my language is Punjabi. My father is leader of our family but my mother runs the house. To show respect to my grandparents I must speak Punjabi. I speak two languages. One of them is English and the other is my own language. At home I sometimes speak Punjabi and sometimes English. My mother and father speak good English and other languages too. It is always polite to answer people in the language that the question is asked - Punjabi with Punjabi and English with English. I am now going to Saturday school to learn to read and write Punjabi.I also have extra Punjabi lessons at my school in Wednesfield.
